column1: In view of the foregoing reasons, we are inclined to set aside the conviction, the
impugned judgment, and the sentence imposed on 09.03.2019.

T
he  Registrar  of  this  Court  is  directed  to  send  this  judgment  together  with  the
original case record to the High Court of Puttalam for compliance.
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
